messages:
Name: João Mário
Nationality: Portugal
Date of Birth: January 19, 1993
Position: Midfielder
Current club: Sporting CP
Primeira Liga clubs played for: Sporting CP, Vitória Setúbal

Sporting CP midfielder João Mário has played in the vast majority of the side's Primeira Liga games in 2020/2021, making 28 appearances overall and accumulating 1,991 minutes of playing time. He has been selected in the starting XI in 24 of these appearances across their 34 fixtures and entered as a substitute on four occasions.

Mário last appeared in a Primeira Liga game on May 15, playing 45 minutes for Sporting CP against Benfica in a 4-3 loss. In total, the midfielder has netted two Primeira Liga goals in 2020/2021, and provided one assist. He has been shown four yellow cards.
It was against Paços de Ferreira on February 15 when Mário last scored, netting in a 2-0 win. His opening goal of the campaign came in the 2-1 victory against Belenenses on December 27.
Mário played 18 Premier League games last season for Lokomotiv Moskva, scored one goal and provided four assists.

Mário switched to Sporting CP on loan in October 2020 from Internazionale, for whom he has made 64 league appearances in total, scoring four goals and providing 10 assists, after joining the club in July 2018 from Sporting CP.
